item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.SPECIALQUERIES() method displays the Select Filter dialog box. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example displays the Select Filter dialog box.

section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Customer Information") ptr.SpecialQueries()
